title: Process Refund for Accidental Purchase
description: A user accidentally purchased a movie on a VOD service and immediately requests a refund.

tasks.description: Identify the user and the recent movie purchase.
Check the playback history for the movie to ensure it has not been watched.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the user has not started watching the movie.

tasks.description: Based on the policy for unwatched content, process a full refund for the purchase.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully issues a refund to the user's payment method.
